title: The Pentridge experience. Part 2
brief_description: Examines problems of prison officers, both within the prison and outside. Also shows the difficulties faced by prisoners and their families through lack of facilities for contact visits. Includes a condemnation of the continued existence of H Division and its medieval labour yards. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
